item.title: CKAD Notes
item.description: Sparse CKAD Notes # Node # Runs the containers deployed on K8s. It is the worker Kubelet # Agent running on the node that monitors health of pods and running pods on the container runtime Container Runtime # Engine that runs the containers Master # Handles all requests and is the brains that orchestrates work on the workers API Server # Receives all incoming API requests and is the frontend to K8s cluster
